con:soapui-project.name: Conformance Class: Discovery Service - CSW Core
con:soapui-project.con:description:
This test suite examines an OGC Discovery Service against the requirements related to INSPIRE

This is a draft version. It has limitations and is expected to contain errors. Please report any issues or problems in GitHub.

Known limitations are documented in the description of the applicable test case or test assertion.

Source: Conformance Class 'Discovery Service CSW'

con:testCase.name: initial-testcase
con:testCase.con:description:
This test case initializes the Executable Test Suite.

It performs an initial GetCapabilities request, it sets common properties with gathered information and it determines the metadata scenario based on the elements provided in the capabilities document.

con:assertion.name: Fail if service returns OWS Exception Report

con:testCase.name: check-initial-testcase
con:testCase.con:description: This test case checks whether the Executable Test Suite has been initialized. If it has not been, it runs the initialization test case.

con:testCase.name: at-07-extended-capabilities
con:testCase.con:description:
Test that the service provides the INSPIRE extended metadata.

More information: Extended Capabilities

con:testCase.name: at-12-discover-resource-matching-query
con:testCase.con:description:
Test that the Discover Metadata response contains at least the INSPIRE metadata elements.

More information: Discover Resource Matching Query

con:assertion.name: Fail if service returns OWS Exception Report

con:testCase.name: at-15-link-publish-metadata-operation
con:testCase.con:description:
Test that discovery client approach is implemented properly.

More information: Link Publish Metadata Operation

con:testCase.name: at-16-link-federated-capabilities-document
con:testCase.con:description:
Test that federated Discovery Service is published in Member State's Discovery Service's capabilities document when the discovery service approach is implemented.

More information: Link Federated Capabilities Document

con:testCase.name: at-19-query-search-criteria
con:testCase.con:description:
Test that the Discover Metadata service supports queryables.

More information: Query Search Criteria

con:testCase.name: at-20-query-language-parameter
con:testCase.con:description:
Test that the Discover Metadata service accepts the language parameter.

More information: Query Language Parameter

con:assertion.name: Fail if service returns OWS Exception Report

con:config.name: http-getrecords-language-filter
con:config.con:request: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <csw:GetRecords xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2" service="CSW" version="2.0.2" resultType="results" startPosition="1" maxRecords="10"> <csw:Query typeNames="csw:Record"> <csw:ElementSetName typeNames="gmd:MD_Metadata">full</csw:ElementSetName> <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0"> <ogc:Filter xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc"> <ogc:PropertyIsEqualTo> <ogc:PropertyName>apiso:Language</ogc:PropertyName> <ogc:Literal>eng</ogc:Literal> </ogc:PropertyIsEqualTo> </ogc:Filter> </csw:Constraint> </csw:Query> </csw:GetRecords>

con:assertion.name: Fail if service returns OWS Exception Report

con:testCase.name: at-21-query-additional-parameters
con:testCase.con:description:
Test that the Discover Metadata service supports additional queryables.

More information: Query Additional Parameters

con:testCase.name: at-22-query-parameters-advertised
con:testCase.con:description:
Test that all ISO and additional queryables are advertised in the capabilities document.

More information: Query Parameters Advertised

con:testCase.name: at-24-language-natural-lang-fields
con:testCase.con:description:
Test that natural language fields vary depending on the requested language.

More information: Language Natural Language Fields

con:testCase.name: at-25-language-parameter-iso-valid
con:testCase.con:description:
Test that the service supports the parameter LANGUAGE.

More information: Language Parameter ISO valid

con:testCase.name: at-26-language-natural-fields-default
con:testCase.con:description:
Test that natural language fields are provided in default language when requested language is unsupported or absent.

More information: Language Natural Fields Default

con:assertion.name: Fail if service returns OWS Exception Report

con:testCase.name: at-27-language-response-value
con:testCase.con:description:
Test that the response language is correct based on the requested language.

More information: Language Response Value

con:assertion.name: Fail if service returns OWS Exception Report

con:testCase.name: at-28-language-supported-default-cardinality
con:testCase.con:description:
Test that the cardinality of supported languages is correct.

More information: Language Supported Default Cardinality

con:testCase.name: at-29-extended-capabilities-schema-valid
con:testCase.con:description:
Test that the capabilities document is schema valid.

More information: Extended Capabilities Schema Valid

con:testCase.name: at-30-language-getrecords-without-parameter
con:testCase.con:description:
Test the service behaviour without a language specific filter.

More information: Language GetRecords without Parameter

con:testCase.name: at-31-language-getrecords-lang-filter
con:testCase.con:description:
Test that the service supports filtering by language.

More information: Language GetRecords Language Filter

con:assertion.name: Fail if service returns OWS Exception Report

con:config.name: manual-check-filter
con:config.con:request: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <csw:GetRecords xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2" service="CSW" version="2.0.2" resultType="results" startPosition="1" maxRecords="10"> <csw:Query typeNames="csw:Record"> <csw:ElementSetName typeNames="gmd:MD_Metadata">full</csw:ElementSetName> <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0"> <ogc:Filter xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc"> <ogc:PropertyIsEqualTo> <ogc:PropertyName>apiso:Language</ogc:PropertyName> <ogc:Literal>zzz</ogc:Literal> </ogc:PropertyIsEqualTo> </ogc:Filter> </csw:Constraint> </csw:Query> </csw:GetRecords>

con:assertion.name: Fail if service returns OWS Exception Report

con:testCase.name: at-32-language-getrecords-exception
con:testCase.con:description:
Test that GetRecords exceptions are provided in the correct language.

More information: Language GetRecords Exception

con:config.name: manual-check-filter
con:config.con:request: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <csw:GetRecords xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2" service="CSW" version="2.0.2" resultType="results" startPosition="1" maxRecords="1"> <csw:Query typeNames="csw:Record"> <csw:ElementSetName typeNames="gmd:MD_Metadata">full</csw:ElementSetName> <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0"> <ogc:Filter xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc"> <ogc:PropertyIsEqualTo> <ogc:PropertyName>apiso:Language</ogc:PropertyName> <ogc:Literal>eng</ogc:Literal> </ogc:PropertyIsEqualTo> </ogc:Filter> </csw:Constraint> </csw:Query> </csw:GetRecords>

con:property.con:name: etf.ignore.properties
con:property.con:value: service, version, extended_capabilities_scenario, lastServiceEndpoint, getrecords_endpoint, authUser, authPwd, authMethod
